Reason: Tokens are classified as unregulated securities and can only be sold to Accredited investors see : CSA Staff Notice 46-307
column5: Exemption should be filed by ICO issuer

Reason: Only if tokens are classified as Securities, then tokens should be sold to Accredited investors
All tokens are classified as unregulated securities and can only be sold to Accredited investors (Rule 501 of Regulation D). Token issuer needs to file exemption under Rule 506 of Regulation D
column5: Reg D exemption should be filed by ICO issuer
